item.title: 2019: Canary Islands
item.description: Overview Flight to Teneriffe, only used for transfer Some days of hiking on El Hierro Transfer Some days of hiking on La Palma One additional day before flight back home El Hierro On the way near Punta de los Bajones, El Hierro On the way near Punta de Malpais, El Hierro TBD Sunset, viewed from La Frontera, El Hierro Dragon tree near Tigaday, El Hierro View towards Tibataje near El Lunch√≥n, El Hierro View above clouds, on top of the mountain, El Hierro Piscina Natural La Maceta, El Hierro La Palma Poris de Candelaria?

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Oliver! This will be my little playground of a website, without regular updates. For now, just static code, no cookies, nothing to buy, no adverts. Licence Avatar Avatar icon taken from www.savagechickens.com with stated authorization by the author (see paragraph ‘Permission & Payment for Web Use’).
